{{Description|A natural freshwater lake.<br />The lake's wide, crystalline appearance has remained unchanged for eons &mdash; so clear you can see the bottom, and cool and refreshing to drink. It is none other than these headwaters that brought Mondstadt's ciders and wines to fame and made the lake the symbol of Mondstadt that it is today.|[https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/map Exploration], Genshin Impact Official Site}}
{{Location Intro|description=<p>Its never-freezing waters are used to create drinks such as apple cider.<ref name="Traveler">{{Ref/VO|Traveler|About Cider Lake}}</ref></p>}}
